contents:
下面是各国媒体对于习近平这番死妈发言的报道标题
REUTERS: China's Xi warns attempts to divide China will end in 'shattered bones'
CNN: Xi vows attempts to split China will 'end in crushed bodies and shattered bones'
Bloomberg: Xi Says Any Attempt to Split China Will Be Crushed: Xinhua
BBC: Hong Kong protests: President Xi warns of 'bodies smashed'
AFP: Attempts to split China risk 'smashed' bodies: Xi
Daily Mail: China's President Xi warns attempts to divide China will end in 'crushed bodies and shattered bones' as Hong Kong demonstrators smash up pro-Beijing businesses and barricade the streets in another weekend of protests
South China Morning Post: Chinese President Xi Jinping warns that anyone trying to split any part of country will be crushed
BBC Japan: 「体はつぶされ骨は粉々に」と習国家主席が分断勢力に警告　香港でデモ続く
AFPBB: 中国分裂を図る者は「体を打ち砕かれ骨は粉々に」、国家主席
CNA: 在中國搞分裂 習近平：痴心妄想粉身碎骨
HK01: 習近平：任何人企圖在中國任何地區搞分裂，結果只能是粉身碎骨
联合早报: 习近平：任何分裂中国企图都是痴心妄想
RTHK: 習近平：任何人企圖在中國任何地區搞分裂只會粉身碎骨

而拆那大外宣:Any attempt to split China will end in vain: Xi

为何恁支大外宣如此车欠，窝暂且蒙在鼓里
